techmeme.title: A look at the growing use of tablets in US prisons, letting inmates make calls, send messages, and more, as the FCC imposes price caps on voice and video calls (Nicholas G. Miller/Wall Street Journal)
Elon Musk boosts a post that disparages the abilities of "women and low T men", advocates a "Republic of high status males", and mentions a "Reich effect" (Ellsworth Toohey/Boing Boing)
A US judge issued a last-minute partial block on Texas law HB 18, that would require some large web services to identify minors and filter what they see online (Adi Robertson/The Verge)
Starlink, which has 250K customers in Brazil, told Brazil's telecom agency that it would not comply with orders to block X until its frozen assets were released (Jack Nicas/New York Times)
A majority of Brazilian judges on a Supreme Court panel vote to confirm an order to ban X in Brazil and fine those who don't comply with it by using a VPN (Daniel Carvalho/Bloomberg)
